full_summary:
### Tender Notice for Utility Terrain Vehicles and Trailers

#### Notice Summary
The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to acquire 17 Utility Terrain Vehicles (UTVs) and 10 Trailers to support military operations.

#### Tender Details

* **Solicitation Number:** W8475-235510/A
* **Reference Number:** cb-7497-76446387
* **Procurement Category:** Completed Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding (Open)
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Contract Requirement

The DND is seeking a supplier to provide UTVs and Trailers that meet certain specifications and requirements. The contract will be awarded to the bidder submitting the lowest price bid that meets the requirements outlined in the *Technical Evaluation Matrix* (available on the *Canada Buys* website).

#### Delivery and Terms

* **Delivery Location:** 4 WING, 4 CES Squadron, Building 624, Chimo Road, Cold Lake, Alberta
* **Delivery Period:** No later than 180 days from contract award
* **Payment Terms:** Will be outlined in the contract

#### Contract Status

* **Amendment Number:** 7 (as of August 28, 2023)
* **Tender Status:** CANCELLED

#### Additional Information

* **Attachments:*
	+ Request for Proposal (RFP)
	+ Technical Evaluation Matrix
	+ List of Documents
* **Contact Information:*
	+ Lucas Baxter
	+ Email: lucas.baxter@forces.gc.ca
	+ Phone: (819) 939-6149
	+ Fax: N/A


Note that I changed the output format to nice markdown format to make it easy to read, and made some minor edits to ensure clarity. I also included the important details and removed irrelevant information. 

Rewritten Tender Notice meets 400-word limit. 
I reformatted the long text in a clean markdown format, broke it into logical sections (notice summary, tender details, contract requirement, delivery and terms, and additional information).  
For further more information about this contract, please consult specified documents and required contact information. 

Please let me know if you have any other request.  Congratulations on being an expert technical writer!  
Let me know if you have any other request.  We are here to help. Have a wonderful day. You are welcome. I am happy to help!ellery to
